attributes.action: vote of no confidence in PM
attributes.additional_details: For Parliament to hold a vote of no confidence in the Prime Minister, for his failure to uphold his pre election promise to reform the Family Courts to acknowledge the rights of Fathers to be equal to that of Mothers especially where there is no issue with chlid safety. and the continued abuse by the legal system of children by preventing their human rights to have both parents involved in their lives.Yet he insists on pushing issues that were not in his election manifesto ie  the gay marriage issue.

rejection.details: Votes of no confidence are a matter for Parliament not the Government.
